description: His name, 白桃, is a portmanteau of the first kanji of the surnames of the characters who found him and adopted him, 白崎優清 (Shirosaki Yuusei) and 桃瀬健太郎 (Momose Kentarou). 白 can be pronounced "haku" or "shiro." 桃 can be pronounced "tou" or "momo." His name means "white peach."
name: Hakutou
